metadata.title: CVE-2019-10224 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw has been found in 389-ds-base versions 1.4.x.x before 1.4.1.3. Whenexecuted in verbose mode, the dscreate and dsconf commands may displaysensitive information, such as the Directory Manager password. An attacker,able to see the screen or record the terminal standard error output, coulduse this flaw to gain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
